NAME AS "name", bookmessage.jiaofu AS "JiaoFu", bookmessage.kind AS "Kind" FROM book LEFT JOIN bookmessage ON book.BookID = bookmessage.BookID WHERE CONCAT( IFNULL(bookmessage.`name`, ''), IFNULL(bookmessage.kind, ''), IFNULL(bookmessage.author, '') ) LIKE concat('%',#{0},'%') GROUP BY book.BookID
